set (TARGET_NAME glfw)

set(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF)

set(GLFW_BUILD_DOCS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(GLFW_BUILD_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(GLFW_BUILD_EXAMPLES OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(GLFW_INSTALL OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)

add_subdirectory(${TARGET_NAME} EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)

set_property(TARGET ${TARGET_NAME} PROPERTY FOLDER "3rdparty")

set(3RDPARTY_INCLUDES ${3RDPARTY_INCLUDES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glfw/include PARENT_SCOPE)
